text: ālahini bemefiratina widētawini bemefelegi layi ginibuni yemešeretewi sewi yibelit’alini weyisi gorifi besheresherewi lemenadi betek’arebe gedeli āfafi layi ginibuni yemešeretewina berisu (yizoti) begehānemi isati wisit’i yewedek’e (yibelit’ali)፡፡ ālahimi bedelenyochi ḥizibochini āyimerami፡፡
